verses.verse: לְמַ֤עַן <S%H4616><s%> sake צִיּוֹן֙ <S%H6726><s%> For Zion's לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> I will not אֶחֱשֶׁ֔ה <S%H2814><s%> sake will I not hold my peace וּלְמַ֥עַן <S%H4616><s%> sake יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> and for Jerusalem's לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> I will not אֶשְׁק֑וֹט <S%H8252><s%> sake I will not rest עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> Until יֵצֵ֤א <S%H3318><s%> thereof go forth כַנֹּ֙גַהּ֙ <S%H5051><s%> as brightness צִדְקָ֔הּ <S%H6664><s%> until the righteousness וִישׁוּעָתָ֖הּ <S%H3444><s%> and the salvation כְּלַפִּ֥יד <S%H3940><s%> thereof as a lamp יִבְעָֽר׃ <S%H1197><s%> [that] burneth

וְרָא֤וּ <S%H7200><s%> shall see גוֹיִם֙ <S%H1471><s%> And the Gentiles צִדְקֵ֔ךְ <S%H6664><s%> thy righteousness וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all מְלָכִ֖ים <S%H4428><s%> and all kings כְּבוֹדֵ֑ךְ <S%H3519><s%> thy glory וְקֹ֤רָא <S%H7121><s%> and thou shalt be called לָךְ֙ שֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> shall name חָדָ֔שׁ <S%H2319><s%> by a new אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> Which פִּ֥י <S%H6310><s%> which the mouth יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD יִקֳּבֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H5344><s%> name

וְהָיִ֛יתְ <S%H1961><s%> will also be a עֲטֶ֥רֶת <S%H5850><s%> Thou shalt also be a crown תִּפְאֶ֖רֶת <S%H8597><s%> of glory בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> in the hand יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD [וּצְנֹוף כ] (וּצְנִ֥יף <S%H6797><s%> diadem ק) מְלוּכָ֖ה <S%H4410><s%> and a royal בְּכַף־ <S%H3709><s%> in the hand אֱלֹהָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H430><s%> of thy God

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> will no יֵאָמֵר֩ <S%H559><s%> Thou shalt no more be termed לָ֨ךְ ע֜וֹד <S%H5750><s%> longer עֲזוּבָ֗ה <S%H5805><s%> forsaking וּלְאַרְצֵךְ֙ <S%H776><s%> neither shall thy land לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor יֵאָמֵ֥ר <S%H559><s%> any more be termed עוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> any שְׁמָמָ֔ה <S%H8077><s%> Desolate כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לָ֗ךְ יִקָּרֵא֙ <S%H7121><s%> but thou shalt be called חֶפְצִי־ בָ֔הּ <S%H2657><s%> Hephzibah וּלְאַרְצֵ֖ךְ <S%H776><s%> and thy land בְּעוּלָ֑ה <S%H1166><s%> Beulah כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for חָפֵ֤ץ <S%H2654><s%> delighteth יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD בָּ֔ךְ וְאַרְצֵ֖ךְ <S%H776><s%> in thee and thy land תִּבָּעֵֽל׃ <S%H1166><s%> shall be married

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יִבְעַ֤ל <S%H1166><s%> marrieth בָּחוּר֙ <S%H970><s%> For [as] a young man בְּתוּלָ֔ה <S%H1330><s%> a virgin יִבְעָל֖וּךְ <S%H1166><s%> marry בָּנָ֑יִךְ <S%H1121><s%> [so] shall thy sons וּמְשׂ֤וֹשׂ <S%H4885><s%> rejoiceth חָתָן֙ <S%H2860><s%> thee and [as] the bridegroom עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over כַּלָּ֔ה <S%H3618><s%> over the bride יָשִׂ֥ישׂ <S%H7797><s%> rejoice עָלַ֖יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> over אֱלֹהָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H430><s%> [so] shall thy God

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on חוֹמֹתַ֣יִךְ <S%H2346><s%> upon thy walls יְרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <S%H3389><s%> O Jerusalem הִפְקַ֙דְתִּי֙ <S%H6485><s%> I have set שֹֽׁמְרִ֔ים <S%H8104><s%> watchmen כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All הַיּ֧וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַלַּ֛יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> nor night תָּמִ֖יד <S%H8548><s%> [which] shall never לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> will never יֶחֱשׁ֑וּ <S%H2814><s%> hold their peace הַמַּזְכִּרִים֙ <S%H2142><s%> ye that make mention אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אַל־ <S%H408><s%> no דֳּמִ֖י <S%H1824><s%> keep not silence לָכֶֽם׃

וְאַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> no תִּתְּנ֥וּ <S%H5414><s%> And give דֳמִ֖י <S%H1824><s%> him no rest ל֑וֹ עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until יְכוֹנֵ֞ן <S%H3559><s%> till he establish וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until יָשִׂ֧ים <S%H7760><s%> and till he make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְרֽוּשָׁלִַ֛ם <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem תְּהִלָּ֖ה <S%H8416><s%> a praise בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> in the earth

נִשְׁבַּ֧ע <S%H7650><s%> hath sworn יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD בִּֽימִינ֖וֹ <S%H3225><s%> by his right hand וּבִזְר֣וֹעַ <S%H2220><s%> and by the arm עֻזּ֑וֹ <S%H5797><s%> of his strength אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Surely I will אֶתֵּן֩ <S%H5414><s%> no more give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּגָנֵ֨ךְ <S%H1715><s%> thy corn ע֤וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again מַֽאֲכָל֙ <S%H3978><s%> [to be] meat לְאֹ֣יְבַ֔יִךְ <S%H341><s%> for thine enemies וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> Nor יִשְׁתּ֤וּ <S%H8354><s%> shall not drink בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> and the sons נֵכָר֙ <S%H5236><s%> of the stranger תִּֽירוֹשֵׁ֔ךְ <S%H8492><s%> thy wine אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which יָגַ֖עַתְּ <S%H3021><s%> for the which thou hast laboured בּֽוֹ׃

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for מְאַסְפָיו֙ <S%H622><s%> But they that have gathered יֹאכְלֻ֔הוּ <S%H398><s%> it shall eat וְהִֽלְל֖וּ <S%H1984><s%> it and praise אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וּֽמְקַבְּצָ֥יו <S%H6908><s%> and they that have brought it together יִשְׁתֻּ֖הוּ <S%H8354><s%> shall drink בְּחַצְר֥וֹת <S%H2691><s%> it in the courts קָדְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H6944><s%> of my holiness ס

עִבְר֤וּ <S%H5674><s%> Go through עִבְרוּ֙ <S%H5674><s%> go through בַּשְּׁעָרִ֔ים <S%H8179><s%> the gates פַּנּ֖וּ <S%H6437><s%> prepare דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> ye the way הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people סֹ֣לּוּ <S%H5549><s%> cast up סֹ֤לּוּ <S%H5549><s%> cast up הַֽמְסִלָּה֙ <S%H4546><s%> the highway סַקְּל֣וּ <S%H5619><s%> gather out מֵאֶ֔בֶן <S%H68><s%> the stones הָרִ֥ימוּ <S%H7311><s%> lift up נֵ֖ס <S%H5251><s%> a standard עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הָעַמִּֽים׃ <S%H5971><s%> for the people

הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Behold the LORD הִשְׁמִ֙יעַ֙ <S%H8085><s%> hath proclaimed אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to קְצֵ֣ה <S%H7097><s%> unto the end הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the world אִמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> Say לְבַת־ <S%H1323><s%> ye to the daughter צִיּ֔וֹן <S%H6726><s%> of Zion הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> Lo יִשְׁעֵ֖ךְ <S%H3468><s%> Behold thy salvation בָּ֑א <S%H935><s%> cometh הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold שְׂכָרוֹ֙ <S%H7939><s%> behold his reward אִתּ֔וֹ <S%H854><s%> for וּפְעֻלָּת֖וֹ <S%H6468><s%> [is] with him and his work לְפָנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> before

וְקָרְא֥וּ <S%H7121><s%> And they shall call לָהֶ֛ם <S%H1992><s%> like עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> people הַקֹּ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> them The holy גְּאוּלֵ֣י <S%H1350><s%> The redeemed יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> God וְלָךְ֙ יִקָּרֵ֣א <S%H7121><s%> and thou shalt be called דְרוּשָׁ֔ה <S%H1875><s%> Sought out עִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> A city לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not נֶעֱזָֽבָה׃ <S%H5800><s%> not forsaken ס
